Posts.Content: Some presistant skin thickening of left breast.poster ior portion of left breast at the level of nipple noted irregular density density is 31mm greast width.biopsy clip in thiscregion (have fat necrosis at that clip) at that region appears to be amorphous calcifications US report at 6 o'clock position within the retroareloa areas some dilated ducts with some branching largest measuribg 5mm width.at 4 o'clock position focol shawdowing at the kevel of skin or just beneath skin suggesting postoperative there does not appear to be any distinct solid masses or cysts follow up mri
Posts.Title: Opinions please
